row.process:
:INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ECHO_ON_OFF :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PUB.INCLUDE.ATTACH !-------------------------------------Logging input parameters------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.HEADER.PARAM_VALIDATION :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Subscription ID" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Keystore Location" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PATH#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Keystore Password" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PSWD#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "VM Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_VM_NAME#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Cloud Service Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICE#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Deployment Name" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_DEPLOYMENT#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Command" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER_VAL# = "&UC4RB_AZR_COMMAND#" :INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.PARAM
! Load package parameters :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.LOAD_PCK_PARAMETERS
!------------------------------------------ Buidling java arguments -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! ! Action name :SET &UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME# = "VM_STATE"
:DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# ,string
!Check for action :SWITCH &UC4RB_AZR_COMMAND# : CASE "SHUTDOWN_DEALLOCATE_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "StoppedDeallocated"
: CASE "SHUTDOWN_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "Stopped"
: CASE "START_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "START"
: CASE "RESTART_VM" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION# = "RESTART" :ENDSWITCH
! Define java options and values :DEFINE &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#, string, 20
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[1] = "-action" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_ACTION_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[2] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[3] = "-subscriptionid" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_SUBSCRIPTION_ID#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[4] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[5] = "-keystore" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PATH#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[6] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[7] = "-vmname" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_VM_NAME#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[8] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[9] = "-servicename" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_CLOUD_SERVICE#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[10] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[11] = "-deploymentname" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_DEPLOYMENT#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[12] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
: SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[13] = "-vmstate" : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_ARG_VALUE "TEMP_OPTION_VALUE"="&UC4RB_AZR_VM_OPERATION#" : SET &UC4RB_AZR_OPTIONS#[14] = "&UC4RB_AZR_OPTION_VALUE#"
! password is decrypted and send to jar as argument : SET &UC4RB_ENCRYPTED_PASSWORD_TMP# = "&UC4RB_AZR_KEYSTORE_PSWD#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.DECRYPT_PASSWORD
!Build java arguments :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.BUILD_JAVA_ARGS_MANAGEMENT
! Setting execution environment :INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.SET_EXEC_ENVIRONMENT
! Invoking java binary :IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "WINDOWS" java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password %UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD% : ELSE : IF &UC4RB_AGENT_OS# = "UNIX" java -jar &UC4RB_AZR_PATH_JAR# &UC4RB_AZR_JAVA_ARGUMENTS# -password $UC4_DECRYPTED_PWD : ENDIF :ENDIF
! Status messages :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_INFO# = "******** CHANGE_VM_STATE ACTION EXECUTED SUCCESSFULLY ********" :SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "******** CHANGE_VM_STATE ACTION FAILED ********"
!------------------------------------------ Error Handling -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_JOBSTATUS

row.post_process: ! Publishing request token in case of success : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_AZURE.PRV.INCLUDE.PUBLISH_REQUEST_ID
